model

Interface Model

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommonModel, MyModel

    public interface Model
    Defines the Model interface derived from the MVP architectural pattern. The model is an interface defining the data to be displayed or otherwise acted upon in the user interface.
    Author:
    Tomer

      • generateMaze

        void generateMaze(java.lang.String name,
                  int rows,
                  int cols,
                  int depth,
                  java.lang.String generateAlgorithm)
        Generate a new 3d Maze according to the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        name - a string used to identify the maze in the mazes HashMap.
        rows - the X dimension.
        cols - the Y dimension.
        depth - the Z dimension.

      • getMazeToSol

        java.util.HashMap<maze.generators.Maze3d,algorithms.search.Solution> getMazeToSol()

      • loadAndDecompress

        void loadAndDecompress()
        Load a Maze3D and Solutions HashMap (mazeToSol) from a compressed GZip file. this method is being used every time the project start, in order to load the mazes that already exists.

      • loadMaze

        void loadMaze(java.lang.String fileName,
              java.lang.String name)
        Load a compressed Maze3d from file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the Maze3d
        name -

      • mazeSize

        void mazeSize(java.lang.String name)
        Get the memory size of a Maze3d instance and display it.
        Parameters:
        name - the Maze3d name in the mazes HashMap.

      • saveMaze

        void saveMaze(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String fileName)
        Save and compress a Maze3d into file.
        Parameters:
        name - the Maze3d name in the mazes HashMap.
        fileName - the name of the intended file.

      • saveToZip

        void saveToZip()
        Save the current Maze3D and Solutions HashMap (mazeToSol) to a GZip file and compress it. This method is being used when exiting the game to save the current generated mazes and solutions.

      • solveMaze

        void solveMaze(java.lang.String name,
               java.lang.String algorithm)
        Solve a Maze3d using a searching algorithm.
        Parameters:
        name - the Maze3d name in the mazes HashMap.
        algorithm - the Search algorithm name.
